availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Birth: February 22, 1800 in Henry County, KY
Death: April 14, 1881 in Henry County, KY
Residence: District 1, Henry County, KY (in 1850); Carrollton, Carroll County, KY (in 1860); Prestonville, Carroll County, KY (in 1870)

Biography: Son of Cornelius Ringo and Sarah C. Morgan. Married Sarah Bryan in Henry County, KY on January 2, 1821. Occupation: farmer (in 1850, 1860, and 1870). Not listed on 1850 or 1860 slaveholder census schedules.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, p. 774.

Eight Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules,
Kentucky, Carroll County, p. 43.

Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules,
Kentucky, Carroll County, p. 2.
Findagrave.com memorial of George S. Ringo, Sr., Find A Grave Memorial # 28421157 Accessed 17 Nov 2016.
